name: Glop Plots
description:
A short little game made for Ludum Dare 38! Glop Plots is an idle sort of game where you must build buildings to gather resources using a very limited number of spaces. Oh yeah, and glops are literally just ground-up grass.

Currently quite barebones as it was made in a short amount of time, however I might look to add more if things go well-ish.
